BR_text.BRsummary: cyclical_learning_rate_test.py is not run by bazel
BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 Like the other ones, the
 <denchmark-code>if __name__ == "__main__":
     tf.test.main()
 </denchmark-code>
 
 was missing. Since pytest doesn't need that, the tests failed with pytest.
 Other info / logs
 The error when actually running the tests:
 <denchmark-code>proof_of_concept_pytest) /mnt/c/Users/gdemarmi/Desktop/projects/addons $ pytest -v tensorflow_addons/optimizers/cyclical_learning_rate_test.py
